name: Cmis4owncloud
tagline: Here an CMIS adaptor for owncloud build. It will use the Owncloud API, Apache Chemistry and leverage the Android Client for Owncloud as a starting point
body:
### Welcome to CMIS4Owncloud. If you want to get started, do the following: 1. build apache chemistry with maven: http://chemistry.apache.org/opencmis-how-to-build.html 2. download tomcat server 3. change the pom.xml to the server path (as shown below) 4. build the project with maven using mvn clean package 5. check [http://localhost:8080/cmis4owncloud/](http://localhost:8080/cmis4owncloud/) for success ``
`org.apache.maven.plugins`
`maven-war-plugin`
``
`cmis4owncloud`
`I:\xampp\tomcat\webapps`
``
`` This will create the template for chemistry and use the file system as repository. This project will then step by setup replace the file repository implementation with calls to the owncloud api. In order to test this, you can use the OpenCMIS Workbench from http://chemistry.apache.org/java/download.html ### Authors and Contributors For now I am the only one working on this. But help is always welcome. ### Support or Contact julian.dehne@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
